sentence.Network_en: He argued that the overcrowded cities were the product of a system based on "selfishness" and "rapacity".
sentence.Network_cn: 他认为，过于拥挤的城市是一个建立在“自私”和“贪婪”基础上的体系的产物。

sentence.Network_en: Here was neither guile nor rapacity.
sentence.Network_cn: 在她身上没有狡诈和贪婪.

sentence.Network_en: During the whole process of construction, the operational safty and rapacity of track must be guaranteed.
sentence.Network_cn: 改建施工期内不影响正线运营安全, 也不降低通过能力.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 贪婪(rapacity) 流氓(rascal) 流氓行为(rascality) 有理性的(rational) 响尾蛇(rattlesnake) 现实(reality) 读物(reading) 推理(reason) 有理智的(reasonable).
rapaciousness 强取rapacity 抢夺rape oil 菜油
狼字的解释--... ... 狼子野心〖 rapacity;aggressivedesignsofthewolves;wildambition;wolfishnature〗 也作“狼籍” lángjǐng.

list.abs: algorithm testing shows : the new maximum flow algorithm in network with both node and edge rapacity confined is completely feasible and availability effective .算法测试表明：点和边有容量约束的网络最大流新算法是完全可行和有效的。
rap 迷住, rapaceous 纺锤形, rap 重敲
野钓(rapac) | Reply at 2008-9-12 13:26:00 | 回复 | 引用 | 举报7 #  jiang(空军一号伞兵) | Reply at 2008-9-12 14:36:00 | 回复.

entry.def: Rapacity is very greedy or selfish behaviour.

example.ex: He argued that the overcrowded cities were the product of a system based on 'selfishness' and 'rapacity'.
example.tran: 他认为，过于拥挤的城市是一个建立在“自私”和“贪婪”基础上的体系的产物。

example.ex: ...the rapacity of landlords and the misery of tenants.
example.tran: 房东的贪得无厌与房客的不幸

means.word_mean: 2. reprehensible acquisitiveness; insatiable desire for wealth (personified as one of the deadly sins)

auth_sentence.content: Enthusiasm, in the presence of lucre, tends toward rapacity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Enthusiasm, in the presence of lucre, tends toward rapacity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Enthusiasm, in the presence of lucre, tends toward rapacity.

auth_sentence.content: Depardieu's desire for more than his portion seemed to represent the rapacity of the times.
auth_sentence.res_content: Depardieu's desire for more than his portion seemed to represent the rapacity of the times.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Depardieu's desire for more than his portion seemed to represent the rapacity of the times.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,"有……倾向;能力或特性等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: cap拿,抓+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→拿住的能力→容量;才能
auda大胆+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.大胆,鲁莽
loqu说话+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.多话,饶舌
mend缺点+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.虚假
rap夺+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.掠夺,贪婪
ten握住+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→tenacious的名词
ver真+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.真实性,诚实
